title: 93/664/EC: Commission Decision of 6 December 1993 amending for the second time Decision 93/24/EEC and concerning additional garantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined for regions free of the disease in France
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 December 1993 amending for the second time Decision 93/24/EEC and concerning additional garantees relating to Aujeszky's disease for pigs destined for regions free of the disease in France (93/664/EC)
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following is added to Annex I to Decision 93/24/EEC:
'France: the departments of: Loire-Atlantique, Maine-et-Loire, Sarthe, Vendée, Charente, Charente-Maritime, Deux-Sèvres, Vienne, Aude.'
This Decision shall apply from 1 December 1993.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 December 1993.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 121, 29. 7. 1964, p. 1977/64.
(2) OJ No L 355, 5. 12. 1992, p. 32.
(3) OJ No L 16, 25. 1. 1993, p. 18.
(4) OJ No L 136, 5. 6. 1993, p. 47.
